summary: In 1930s, a psychotic drifter who's after the mystery woman who covered his whole body in illustrations that foresee distant future shows three of them (The Veldt, The Long Rain and The Last Night of the World) to a mesmerized traveler.
cast: Rod Steiger|Claire Bloom|Robert Drivas|Don Dubbins|Jason Evers|Tim Weldon|Christine Matchett|Pogo
keywords: venus the planet|full body tattoo|marooned|distant future|sci fi anthology
title: El hombre ilustrado
